title: Among Elms and Maples juxtaposition of wanted

content.question: The juxtaposition of what Evans “wanted” (line 12) and “didn’t want” (line 14) serves to emphasize that Evans

choices.label: preferred formal portraits rather than unposed candid photographs
focused on the details of the landscape rather than the lives of the people who inhabit it
tended to take photographs from a distance rather than at close range
sought out architectural styles particularly well suited to photography

content.answer: focused on the details of the landscape rather than the lives of the people who inhabit it

skill.text: Skill 3.D: Explain the function of contrasts within a text.
